definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: There are many types of tuna , and bluefin tuna is considered to be the highest grade of all.
sentences.chinese: 鮪魚的種類繁多，黑鮪魚則爲其中最高級的一種。

sentences.english: There are many types of tuna , and bluefin tuna is considered to be the highest grade of all.
sentences.chinese: 鮪魚的種類繁多，黑鮪魚則爲其中最高級的一種。

sentences.english: Then, a tuna swam up to them.
sentences.chinese: 此時，有一隻鮪魚向他們遊了過來。

sentences.english: I am the tuna . I followed you out of the whale's belly.
sentences.chinese: 我是那隻鮪魚，我跟着你們逃出鯨魚的肚子。

sentences.english: I'd like a cup of coffee, a tuna sandwich, and some orange juice.
sentences.chinese: 我要來一杯咖啡，一份鮪魚三明治，還有一些柳橙汁。

sentences.english: It's from Pingtung County in the south, where she was born.
sentences.chinese: 那塊鮪魚來自南方的屏東，她的出生地。

sentences.english: Maybe it will open when the strong raw tuna is digested.
sentences.chinese: 也許，當那些生鮪魚消化以後，它就有力量張開了。

sentences.english: Crad Meat and Caviar, Hoem Smoked Scallop, Tataki Tuna Fish.
sentences.chinese: 蟹肉魚子醬，自制核桃木薰乾貝，霜燒鮪魚。

sentences.english: The science of earthquakes is uncovered along with the plight of the bluefin tuna.
sentences.chinese: 地震科學和黑鮪魚的困境一道被揭密。

sentences.english: Bluefish tuna is very precious; we may not even catch one.
sentences.chinese: 黑鮪魚超珍貴的，還不一定捉的到呢。

sentences.english: So can you bring some bluefish tuna back for us?
sentences.chinese: 那你可以帶點黑鮪魚回來給我們嗎？

sentences.english: I am sure your dad has caught bluefish tuna before right?
sentences.chinese: 那你爸一定有補過黑鮪魚吧？

sentences.english: Bluefin tuna, which melts in your mouth, is still seen as a rare delicacy even now.
sentences.chinese: 入口即化的黑鮪魚，目前仍被看作是稀有珍味。
穿小羊駝，喫甜味薄燒鮪魚片。

sentences.english: "How can I help you?" asked the tuna.
sentences.chinese: “我可以幫你們什麼忙嗎？”鮪魚問道。
